name: Manamune
simpleDescription: Increases Attack Damage based on maximum Mana

passives.name: Awe
passives.effects: Grants {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} equal to {{as|2% '''maximum''' mana}}.

passives.name: Manaflow
passives.effects: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge [[on-hit]] and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an [[champion ability|ability]] to grant {{as|3 '''bonus''' mana}}, increased to {{as|6|mana}} for champion targets, up to a '''maximum''' of {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}. Can only be triggered once per {{tip|cast instance}}.
